ComicInfo.Title: Crypt of Tomorrow; Cavern of the Doomed; The Cry of Satan; Death Pact; Weird Worlds; The Captain of Death
ComicInfo.Summary:
An alien race drops a poisonous bomb on New York City and kills everyone on Earth except Joe Turner.
Countess Aurora Karine sells her soul to Satan for witch-like powers that she uses to take over her small country. Upon death she is greeted by the ghosts of those she haw wronged that drag her to hell.
Edgar, in a fit of rage, kills his sister, a witch. Delfina takes revenge by killing Edgar and David, but is unable to control Miss Hester's cat, Satan, who kills her.
A down on his luck gambler, "Stud" Kelton, is given a small jade idol that turns his luck around, but after a year the bill is due.
Captain Blackett tries to take over a small Caribbean island.
